text:
MAURICE F. SEAY
DIRECTOR
W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
BATTLE CREEK , MICHIGAN
November 26, 1962
PHONE WO 5 - 1221
Dr. William G. Harley, President
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
13^6 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D.C.
Dear Bill:
Your letter of October 31* the financial statement, and the
program report which you enclosed make it possible for us to close
the file on your Foundation-supported project. Your financial report
shows that you had a deficit for the year of $8,183.83. Phis deficit,
we assume, was cared for with funds from other sources.
We are glad that the Association has had a successful program and
growth during the period of the Foundation grant. We congratulate you
and your colleagues and wish for you continued success.
Sincerely.
Maurice F. Seay
MFS:jf
RECEIVED
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
NOV 29 1962
